hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo 'while true; do' > /tmp/hostname-date.sh echo " cat /etc/hostname | tr '\n' ' '> /tmp/hostname-date.txt;" > /tmp/hostname-date.sh echo " echo $(date +%d-%b-%Y_%Hh:%Mm:%Ss) >> /tmp/hostname-date.txt;" >> /tmp/hostname-date.sh echo "sleep 60;" >> /tmp/hostname-date.sh echo "done" >> /tmp/hostname-date.sh chmod 755 /tmp/hostname-date.sh
echo '[Unit]' > /etc/systemd/system/hostname-date.service echo 'Description=Hostname-Date-Task' >> /etc/systemd/system/hostname-date.service echo '' >> /etc/systemd/system/hostname-date.service echo '[Service]' >> /etc/systemd/system/hostname-date.service echo 'Type=notify' >> /etc/systemd/system/hostname-date.service echo 'ExecStart=/tmp/hostname-date.sh' >> /etc/systemd/system/hostname-date.service echo 'KillMode=process' >> /etc/systemd/system/hostname-date.service echo 'Restart=on-failure' >> /etc/systemd/system/hostname-date.service echo 'RestartSec=30s' >> /etc/systemd/system/hostname-date.service echo '' >> /etc/systemd/system/hostname-date.service echo '[Install]' >> /etc/systemd/system/hostname-date.service echo 'WantedBy=multi-user.target' >> /etc/systemd/system/hostname-date.service
systemctl start hostname-date systemctl enable hostname-date
